content: you should end with row 2 heel turn turn work so that ws is facing you row 1 ws sl1 p16 p2tog p1 turn work row 2 rs sl1 k3 ssk k1 turn work row 3 ws sl1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn work row 4 rs sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn work work row 3 & 4 back and forth until all the stitches have been worked you should end up with 18 stitches gusset change to color b round 1 pick up and knit 16 stitches along the side of the heel flap n1 continue to knit instep stitches on n2 & n3 16 sts & 16 sts and pick up 16 stitches along the other side of heel flap n4 divide the 18 stitches on n5 the stitches left after knitting the heel turn evenly between n4 and n1 this marks the new bor in the middle of the sole of your sock round 2 decrease round knit until last 2 sts on n1 knit2tog knit instep sts 32 on n2 & n3 ssk k to end on n4 round 3 knit all stitches repeat gusset rounds 2 & 3 for a total of 6 times =12 rounds you should now be in the beginning of round 14 rounds 14 & 15 decrease round change to main color 4 #laurelknits #colorpalettesocks round 16 decrease round rounds 17-19 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to end foot change to color c after gusset decreases you should have 64 sts on your needles 16sts per needle continue knitting 3 more color blocks for foot rounds 1-19 as explained in leg/ shown in chart change colors for rounds 1-15 in each color block first color block after gusset color c second color e and third color f toe toe is knit in main color divide the sts evenly on 4 needles round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 2 knit all sts round 3 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 4 knit all sts round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 6 knit all sts round 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 8 knit all sts round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 10 knit all sts round 11 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round round 12 *k2tog repeat * to end of round break yarn thread through a tapestry needle and draw through the remaining 8 stitches pull tight through the wrong side and weave in the end weave in all the ends this may take a while and block the socks for a nice finish i really hope you enjoy knitting these can t wait to see your takes on these color palette socks on instagram and ravelry 5 #laurelknits #colorpalettesocks 6 #laurelknits #colorpalettesocks
